section.title: Simple Configuration
section.programlisting:
# Enable inspection engine InspectionEngine On
# Enable audit engine AuditEngine On AuditLog /var/log/ironbee/auditlog.log AuditLogStorageDir /var/log/ironbee/auditlog/
# -- Sites --
# IronBee <Site ironbee> Hostname *.ironbee.com ironbee.com ip=192.168.1.1 </Site>
# SSL Labs <Site ssllabs> Hostname *.ssllabs.com ssllabs.com ip=192.168.1.2 </Site>
# Default <Site default> Hostnanme * </Site>
